Openflows

System Methods Currency

Currency is the living layer of Openflows: what is currently moving through the system as conditions change.

Currency contains two forms with different levels of stability.

Types of currency

Currents

Provisional movement: tensions, questions, early patterning, and partial insights. Currents preserve sensitivity to change and resist premature certainty.

Circuits

Completed loops: moments where convergence and interpretation reconnect to produce a durable shift, where something becomes clarified, integrated, or reusable across contexts.

Some entries include a mediation note documenting when AI assisted the artifact and what role humans played in shaping the outcome.

Index view: all entries across types, newest first.
